overview: The new "sub-series" of PAW Patrol will take viewers to an unexpected, extraordinary and chivalrous medieval universe. But encounters with dukes, princesses, knights and even dragons are no picnic for our PAW Patrol heroes, with danger lurking close by! Claw, the Doberman puppy, will give our PAW Patrol heroes a hard time! Fortunately, they soon discover that Claw's mount, the dragon Sparks, is very sensitive to marshmallows... Even in the Middle Ages, the Patrol is on top form!
title: PAW Patrol: Rescue Knights
